manager

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • manager.UserManager

  • public final class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Description: Class that communicates with the UserDB class as a proxy to pass information utilized in communicating with the database.
    Author:
    Tristen Kreutz, Cesar Guzman, Taylor Hanlon

      • recover

        public static boolean recover(java.lang.String email,
                              java.lang.String ip)
                       throws ConfigException
        Sends a password recovery email to a valid user.
        Parameters:
        email - String The email address that the user wants us to recover.
        ip - String The ip of the request to recover the user's email.
        Returns:
        true if the user's email is already an existing user and the email was successfully sent.
        Throws:
        ConfigException - If the config file cannot be found.

      • verification

        public static boolean verification(java.lang.String verificationID,
                                   int verificationType)
                            throws ConfigException
        Verifies that the given user has been sent a verification email.
        Parameters:
        verificationID - String The UUID used to verify the email link.
        verificationType - int The type of thing that the system is checking is verified.
        Returns:
        true if the user with the given verification id last used the verification type within the configured timeout period.
        Throws:
        ConfigException - if the config file is missing.

      • recoveryChangePass

        public static boolean recoveryChangePass(java.lang.String newPass,
                                         java.lang.String confirmPass,
                                         java.lang.String verificationID,
                                         java.lang.String ip)
                                  throws ConfigException
        Changes the password for a recovery attempt, but only if the verification id checks out and both passwords match.
        Parameters:
        newPass - String The new password to be assigned to the user.
        confirmPass - String The user's attempt to duplicate the new password.
        verificationID - String The universally unique id that
        ip -
        Returns:
        true if the given verification id matches, the two different passwordds match, and the password was successfully updated.
        Throws:
        ConfigException
